thread.title: Brooklyn Decker gives birth to a baby boy, her first child with husband Andy Roddick
thread.title_full: Brooklyn Decker gives birth to a baby boy, her first child with husband Andy Roddick

author: Marisa Laudadio
title: Brooklyn Decker gives birth to a baby boy, her first child with husband Andy Roddick
text:
Brooklyn Decker gives birth to a baby boy, her first child with husband Andy Roddick Wonderwall 8 hrs ago By Marisa Laudadio Â© MICHAEL SIMON/StarTraks Brooklyn Decker gives birth to a baby boy, her first child with husband Andy Roddick It's a boy!
AdChoices Brooklyn Decker and husband Andy Roddick have welcomed their first child, a son, Us Weekly reports .
The model-turned-actress, 28, and the tennis champ, 33, announced that they were expecting in May. She gave birth in Austin, Texas, on Sept. 30, according to Us.
The " Grace and Frankie " star documented her pregnancy on social media all summer long. One sweet snapshot Brooklyn posted in June showed her wearing a plaid flannel shirt with her growing bump peeking out.
The pair, who married in 2009, kept their baby's gender a secret during Brooklyn's pregnancy. But not long after they publicly shared their happy news, Andy revealed they were going back and forth on what to call their child.
"The name is still debatable," he told People. "We're open to any and all suggestions. We're going to figure it out as we go."
In April 2014, the former Sports Illustrated swimsuit issue model revealed she and her husband were gearing up to start a family. "I love kids. I definitely want kids," she told People. "I just have to figure out the timing of that."
Fergie totes her baby boy, plus more celebritots of 2015 Go to MSN Home
